description: globally unique id for this event
name: id

description: BSON id of the user that this push notification was sent to
name: user_id

description: external user id of the user
name: external_user_id

description: unix timestamp at which the user opened the push
name: time

description: API ID of the app this action occurred on
name: app_id

description: API ID of the campaign this push notification belongs to
name: campaign_id

description: name of the campaign
name: campaign_name

description: API ID of the message variation this user received
name: message_variation_id

description: API ID of the canvas this push notification belongs to
name: canvas_id

description: name of the canvas
name: canvas_name

description: API ID of the canvas variation this user received
name: canvas_variation_id

description: API ID of the canvas step this push notification belongs to
name: canvas_step_id

description: API id of the canvas step message variation this user received
name: canvas_step_message_variation_id

description: platform of the device
name: platform

description: version of the operating system of the device
name: os_version

description: model of the device
name: device_model

description: message send ID this message belongs to
name: send_id

description: id of the device on which the event occurred
name: device_id

description: Action type of the push notification button. One of [URI, DEEP_LINK, NONE, CLOSE, SHARE]. null if not from a button click
name: button_action_type

description: identifier (button_string) of the push notification button clicked. null if not from a button click
name: button_string
